Name: The King
Review Text: Good food, tasty, sweet potato fries were bang on. Slight greasy, price was more than I thought it should be, but I like to try and be open to new. I'd say 3.7 on the whole so just sneaks up to 4 star!

Name: The King
Review Text: I picked up takeaway breakfast here. We got the natural pancake, bacon pancake, and a ham and cheese omelette. The food was really good, but the service was great for us. Both the gentlemen were very nice and accommodating, even bringing the pancakes to a table to allow me to add my own toppings before packing it up.

Name: The King
Review Text: Great english breakfast for 8.50e, the music was not bad and the staff was very friendly. We had a good time!

Name: The King
Review Text: Don't go there! I paid 5 euro's for a medium orange jus which wasn't even fresh. Unbelievable that these kind of places still exist. A shame for my hometown.

Name: The King
Review Text: great english breakfast. perfect and not too expensive.

Name: The King
Review Text: Actually quite good for the prices, one star less for the living caterpillar

Review Text: Fantastic breakfast and good price
